Posted By: WolfWhoWalks (6/5/2013 12:52:17 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Now, [Llanowar elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar elves) is a one drop and there are a lot of two drops with significant relevance. But this guy, while he might seem harder to play and can't be put in any old green deck (although, you COULD try some [Burning-Tree Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning-Tree Emissary) shenanigans) works far better with the guildgate abundance in limited as well as if you miss your chance at a one drop in general.  
  
More useful than other mana dooders lategame as he also gives your deck inevitability. Definitely has a place in my commander deck and all my decks that play red/green.
posts.html:
Now, Llanowar elves is a one drop and there are a lot of two drops with significant relevance. But this guy, while he might seem harder to play and can't be put in any old green deck (although, you COULD try some Burning-Tree Emissary shenanigans) works far better with the guildgate abundance in limited as well as if you miss your chance at a one drop in general.

More useful than other mana dooders lategame as he also gives your deck inevitability. Definitely has a place in my commander deck and all my decks that play red/green.
